summary: Comprehensive testing of NeuroVita Whitelabel CMS platform. All backend APIs and frontend features are working correctly. CMS functionality verified - settings changes persist and propagate across all pages.
seed_data_creation: Test orders created during backend testing (prefixed with TEST_)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All CMS features tested and working. Backend APIs (settings, images, orders) fully functional. Frontend pages (Home, FAQ, About, Sales, Admin) load dynamic content from backend. Admin panel tabs (Marca, Produto, Imagens, Hero, Benefícios, Depoimentos, FAQ, Sobre, Pedidos) all functional. CEP lookup (ViaCEP API) working on /comprar page. Settings changes via admin panel persist to database and reflect on all pages.

home_page.details: Header shows NeuroVita branding, benefits and testimonials load from backend, product image displayed, footer shows contact info

faq_page.details: FAQ title loads, 7 default FAQ items rendered from backend, accordion is interactive

about_page.details: Mission, Vision, Values sections load from backend settings

sales_page.details: 3 product options displayed from backend, CEP lookup (01310-100) works, address auto-fills, shipping calculated

admin_panel.details: All 9 tabs functional (Marca, Produto, Imagens, Hero, Benefícios, Depoimentos, FAQ, Sobre, Pedidos). Salvar Tudo saves changes. Settings persist after refresh.
